main event: A UFO sighting occurred over Aquadilla, Puerto Rico on 17 Dec 1960, described as an object hovering or moving slowly.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes, The object was observed visually and characteristics were similar to a satellite, No known satellites or space vehicles were present in the area during the sighting, The object appeared luminous and emitted a pale bluish-green glow, Multiple objects were initially observed that seemed to divide and then recombine.
sighted object: one luminous object hovering in the sky
witness description: A UFO sighting account from a Major in the USAF, who observed a luminous object over the Aquadilla Airport area.
